snippet.title: Lithium-ion new hotness in electric cars—except for Toyota
snippet.description: ...For the past several years, almost all the electric action on the roads has come in the form of electric hybrids with gasoline engines, a concept that Toyota popularized with its Prius but adopted by a number of other manufacturers.
